For some reason i cant connect to any seeds for this???

guys... THIS TORRENT ACTUALLY WORKS!!!! follow these steps to get the game working(100%):

1. Download magic iso from www.filehippo.com
2. Download anytoiso converter(google it)
3. Extract the zip file using winrar
4.Of the two files (one is mdf, other is mds) rename the mdf file extension from .mdf to .bin
5. Run anytoiso converter
6.select the .bin file and convert into iso image
7.mount the file using magic iso(right click on iso image>magic iso>mount>x:no media)

ENJOY!!!
